about_the_game:
This is a simple simulator with 4 amazing girls you can play with. No bullshit storyline, No uncontrolled animation. Just there for you when you are feeling horny.
When you enter the simulator, you will be able to choose which ever girl, then you will be entering a room with two playable buttons, where one is action refers to continuous action of intercourse, and the other cum button is referring to ending the animations. This is a 3d person game simulator, and players can move around the house to observe closely, as well as different angles of the high-definition girls and the furniture. The girls are made with high definition meaning it contains high poly count, this is why the actual file size is a little bit big. However, the high-definition poly count model is the key for this simulator as we aimed for the best graphics for simulating realism while maintaining playable game. The environment background is a simple night sky metropolitan to create the feeling of busy city. And finally, a very simple jazzy background music for you to enjoy the simulator.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contains explicit sexual scenes; Player must be over 18 years in order to play this game. 
This Game also contains violence including gun flights, player must be over 18 year old in order to play this game
